title: Trust-Based Supervision and Learning Impact: Language Education Leader Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competencies through project-based assessment in digital device-enabled educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more trust-based supervision strategies in various educational contexts.
Learners can write reports analyzing the correlation between trust levels and learning effectiveness during supervision through reflective journaling.
Learners can classify overconfidence/underconfidence cases within language education teams and propose effective mediation strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
